autoIndexUpdateInterval.name: Auto index update interval
autoIndexUpdateInterval.name[zh_CN]: 自动更新索引时间间隔
autoIndexUpdateInterval.description[zh_CN]: 全文索引的自动更新索引时间间隔，单位为秒
autoIndexUpdateInterval.description: Automatic index update interval for full-text indexes in seconds

inotifyResourceCleanupDelay.name: Inotify Resource Cleanup Delay (ms)
inotifyResourceCleanupDelay.name[zh_CN]: Inotify 资源清理延迟（毫秒）
inotifyResourceCleanupDelay.description[zh_CN]: 停止文件系统监控后，延迟清理 inotify 监控资源的等待时间，单位为毫秒。此延迟有助于避免因频繁停止/启动监控而导致的高昂重建开销。
inotifyResourceCleanupDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before inotify monitoring resources are cleaned up after file system monitoring is stopped. This delay helps to avoid expensive rebuild costs due to frequent stop/start of monitoring

maxIndexFileSizeMB.name: Max index file size (MB)
maxIndexFileSizeMB.description[zh_CN]: 单个索引文件的最大大小，单位为兆字节（MB）。
maxIndexFileSizeMB.description: Maximum size for an individual index file in Megabytes (MB).

supportedFileExtensions.name: Supported file extensions
supportedFileExtensions.description[zh_CN]: 将被考虑用于索引的文件后缀名列表。
supportedFileExtensions.description: List of file extensions that will be considered for indexing.

indexHiddenFiles.name: Index hidden files
indexHiddenFiles.description[zh_CN]: 是否索引被操作系统标记为隐藏的文件和文件夹。默认为否。
indexHiddenFiles.description: Whether to index files and folders marked as hidden by the operating system. Defaults to false.

folderExcludeFilters.name: Folder exclude filters
folderExcludeFilters.description[zh_CN]: 从索引中排除的目录名称模式列表。这些目录及其内容将不会被索引。
folderExcludeFilters.description: List of directory name patterns to exclude from indexing. These directories and their contents will not be indexed.
